reviews.review:
Half Life oraz dodatki Blue Shift i Opposing Force.
Nostalgiczne klasyki w swoim gatunku.
Headcrabs are the scariest shit you'll ever see, atleast for me.

this game gives me heavy ass
remember to be big brain and not dumb stupid brain
:)
Um dos, se não o primeiro jogo que joguei na vida. Minha avaliação positiva nem é por ele ter sido o primeiro, mas por ser uma obra extranatural mesmo

infuriating at points but overall i enjoyed the game thoroughly. Not perfect if you have a neurodivergent (as in, non-average, such as ADHD/Autism) brain because some puzzles rely on you thinking of something in the way developers want you to, which not everybody can. Still, if you don't mind looking things up every once in a while, would still recommend!
This game is like, probably one of the best games you can get on here, and the price is pretty darn good
o que eu gostei foi o tipo da história, os gráficos, simplesmente tudo tudoooooooooooooooooooooooo

A pure masterpiece. This first version of the Half Life genre is certainly a must-play for any pc gamer. Even though it did not age well graphically, the gameplay gives the player an unique challenge between fps action and puzzles. I fully recommend to play this on the hard difficulty to get the greatest experience from this game. Don't forget the great story and atmosphere in this game. 

If you are interested to try the Half Life genre, this one is certainly the first you should try. The game 'Black Mesa' (recently released by fans) is also worth a check if you prefer the visuals.
Um clássico dos fps's que envelheceu muito bem, história envolvente que te prende. se você não jogou, não perca tempo que vale a pena.
küçükler bu ne amk diyo büyüklerin gözü yaşlı :D

While not as good as it's sequel, Half-Life is still worth playing today. It's a great game that made FPS games what they are today. While Doom was the 1st evolution of FPS games, Half-Life is 2nd evolution.
çok güsel uzaylılar vik vik hop hop korkutuyor zor oyun
Holds up even today (except for Xen.) 9/10.

Что такое HALF LIFE?
HALF LIFE это когда ты не понимаешь куда идти.
HALF LIFE это когда у тебя остается 30 hp и против тебя целая армия.
HALF LIFE это когда отдача у любого оружия больше чем у калаща в cs go
HALF LIFE это когда в конце пукан на столько взрывается, что допроходишь с читами.
HALF LIFE это крутой хардкорный шутер, который может дать фору некоторым нынешним шутерам

Very entertaining and paved the way for future fps games, also has very classic moments which are fun to play through. Can be pretty frustrating but the ending is worth it. 10/10 would not say a word the whole game again

Eu finalmente joguei Half-Life depois de ouvir bem sobre e caramba...merece a fama.
O jogo mistura elementos de FPS com stealth e puzzle, além de ter um soundtrack muito bom, e o mesmo pode se dizer da história. Apesar dos gráficos antigos, vale MUITO a pena jogar. Ansioso pra checar o 2.

Half-Life is a beautiful masterpiece! While yes the graphics are bit dated but the gameplay is still amazing! Thought there are some flaws that make it kind of annoying. One of these is the way you can move objects around. In Half-Life you can shove objects around by running into them. This is a good way to move them but can take awhile. Or instead of that you could press e on them and move them. It moves much faster but.... it's almost uncontrollable! In order to move it must hold e and walk around and depending on what way you walk it will slide in that direction. This works until you realize that the objects have no friction when doing this and will fling across the room. Other than that the game still holds up really well and I would recommend it to anyone who wants a little challenge and fun.
A Amazing game. Better than Half-life 2 in my opinion.

I don't have anything really new or insightful to say that hasn't been said.
A classic that still holds up, until you get out of this world.

This game is a classic, unfortunately, I was a little late to the party. I do not regret buying this game and it's definitely worth the money considering how cheap it is.
This is a truly great game and anyone who enjoys a good FPS or someone who wants to try playing an FPS should play this game.

Legendary classic. One of the trendsetting games in the FPS genre.

This game still holds up to this day and is one of my favorites!

The story is awesome
The gameplay is awesome

The AI is really just.. out of this world! The characters in this game are almost too realistic and you can really feel their emotions trough the wonderful voiceactors.
No but in all seriousness, this game is awesome and i absolutely love it both for the amazing story ark and the less inteligent AI. The fact that this game is old and doesnt have the best technology, only adds to the awesome factor!
And the charcters are the best part!

Очень классная игра. Поначалу я не понимал что интересного в такой графике простым геймплем, но чем больше играл тем больше начинала нравиться эта игра. Так что если не играли советую. А если уже играли то можете пройти Black Messa https://store.steampowered.com/app/362890/Black_Mesa/
amazing game with near flawlass story telling and gameplay

It's really good for being an FPS from 1998, but be warned, its pretty hard.

the standard for all FPS games, and clearly a classic.
on the downside its a bit buggy at times.
dont expect half life 2 from this, very diffferent mechanics but not a bad game at all

This is a genre classic and for a good reason.

turning corpses into spaghetti and meatballs with a crowbar is worth the ten dollars

the funny scientist is worth 60

Freeman, I've been waiting for you. One of your scientist pals said to give you a message. You're supposed to take this old rail system up to some kind of satellite delivery rocket. I don't know where it is exactly, and the old guy was so worried about getting out of here alive he didn't tell me. The main thing is, the military aborted the launch, so when you do find the rocket, you'll have to get up to the control room and launch it yourself. He said something about a Lambda team needing the satellite in orbit if they were ever going to clean up this mess.
This game is good but like
The game that started it all. Nostalgia hits every single time the old valve screen loads <3
Herkese Öneririm Hikaye Kısmı Çok Güzel Olsa da PVP  de ışın silahı kullanan o**spu çocukları can sıkıyor
脚！！好滑啊！！！！你是索尼克吗？？！

When you play a 22 year old game for the first time in 2020 and still find it better than tons of AAA crap (looking at you Activision and Ubisoft) , the game speaks for itself. Ohh you're asking me why I never played this before? Well I had heard so much about this game, I didn't have it in me to pirate it for all these years and I joined steam only few months before I purchased this legend. And trust me, it was totally totally worth it. 

P.S: I am ready to be crucified and burned on a stake for claiming HL1 >>>>> HL2 and the episodes. Mostly for that impending doom feeling, the beautiful geography outside Black Mesa and Xen. I was so crushed when I found out the sequels wont have Xen. Thanks the almighty GabeN for Opposing Force.

P.P.S: I played with the subtitles mod hence the '20 minutes'. I have 10h and 6h respectively in Opposing Force and Blue shift if you wanna verify. They didn't have a subtitle mod sadly. Also possibly my only gripe with the game.
